text: The Angel of the North is a sculpture in Gateshead, England. It was made by the English sculptor Anthony Gormley. It was built in 1994 and finished in 1998. It is made from copper, concrete and weathering steel. == Other websites == * Gateshead Council's Angel of the North website * Angel of the North â€“ Antony Gormley's official website * The Angel of the North at icons.org, featuring pictures of the sculpture under construction Category:Sculptures Category:Gateshead Category:1998 works Category:1990s in art
title: Angel of the North
